titleStmt.title: SII 7.773: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 773. (A.R. No. 149 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmālai miṭaintu poṉmālai tikaḻtarap pāmālai malinta parumaṇittiraḷpuyat tirunilamaṭantaiyoṭu jayamaka ḷiruppat taṉ varaimārvan taṉateṉap peṟṟut tirumakaḷ ḷorutani yiruppak kalaimakaḷ coṟṟiṟam puṇarnta kaṟpiṉaḷāki viruppoṭu ṉāvaka
t tiruppa ticaitoṟum tikiriyoṭu ceṅkol naṭappa Akiḷlapuvanamum kavippator putumatipola veṇkuṭai mimicai niṟpa karuṅkali Oḷittu vanpilattiṭaik kiṭappa kuḷattiṭait teluṅkavīmaṉ vilaṅkalmimicai yeṟavum kaliṅkapūmiyai kanaḷ
leri parukavum Aimpaṭaipparuvattu vempaṭai tāṅkiyum veṅkaimaṇṭalam tāṅkiṉitiruntu vaxaṭaticai yaṭippaṭuttaruḷi teṉṟicai tarumamaum tavamum tānamum taḻaippa vetamum meymaiyu mātiyukampolat talaittalai ciṟappa vantaruḷi velaṟkarum po
rppuliyāṇai pārttivar cūṭa niṟaimaṇimakuṭam muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭi maṉṉuyiṟ kellām miṉṉuyir tāypoṟ ṟaṇṉoḷi parappit taṉittani parattu maṇmuḻutu kaḷippa maṉuneṟi vaḷarttu taṉkoyiṟ koṟṟavācaṟpuṟattu maṇi nāvoṭuṅka muracukaḷ muḻaṅka
vijaiyamum pukaḻum meṉme loṅka vāḻivāḻi mānilaṅ kākkakat tirumaṇi poṟṟeṭṭeḻutu pattāṇṭu varumuṟai muṉne maṉṉavar cumantu tiṟai niraittuk kuvitta cempoṟ kuvaiyāl tan kulanāyakaṉ tāṇṭavem puriyum cempoṉ
Ampalañ cūḻ tirumāḷikaiyum kopuravācalil kūṭakacālamum Ulaku valaṅkoṇ ṭoḷiviḷaṅku nemi kulavarai Utaiyakuṉṟamoṭu niṉṟeṉap pacumpoṉ meyntu palivaḷar pīṭamum vicumpoḷit taḻaippa viḷaṅku poṉmeyntu Irunilan taḻaippa Imai
yavar kaḷippap periya tirunāḷ perumper viḻāveṉum Uyar puraṭṭāti Uttiraṭṭātiyil Ampala niṟaitta Aṟputakkūttar Inpar vāḻa Eḻuntaruḷuvataṟkut tirutterk koyil cempon meyvittu parutiraḷmuttiṉ payilvaṭam parappi niṟaimaṇimāḷikai neṭunterviti tiruvaḷarperāl cey
tucamaittaruḷi paimpoṟ kuvitta parikalamutalāṟ cempoṟ kaṟpakattoṭu paricciṉnamum Aḷavillā
taṉa Oḷipeṟa vamaittup pattāmāṇṭu cittiraittiṅka ḷattam peṟṟa Ātittavārattut tiruvaḷar patiyil tiraiyodaśipakkattu Iṉnaṉa palavum Initu camaittaruḷit taṉ Orukuṭaikkiḻ taraṇimuḻutum taḻaippa ceḻiyar veñcuram puka ceralar kaṭal puka vaḻitaru ciṅkaṇar rañci neñcalamara kaṅkar tiṟaiyiṭa kaṉnaṭar ventiṭa koṅka rotuṅkak koṅkaṇar cāya maṟṟetticai maṉnaru
n tantamak karaṇṇen tirumāl ceppi Urimaiyi liṟaiñcit teriyar tilatam tiyākapatākai purikuḻal maṭappiṭi puṉitakuṇavaṉitai tiripuvaṉamuṭaiyāḷivaḷeṉa tiruvuḷḷat taruḷumuḻutuṭaiyāḷeṉa Uṭaniruppa neṭumālātakattu piriyāteṉṟum mātar maṭamayil pūtalat taruntati Araṇiya kaṟpil taraṇimuḻutumuṭaiyāḷivaḷeṉa tirumaṇimārvat taruḷuṭan ṉiruppa cempoṉ virasiṁhāsanattu tiripu
Digital edition of SII 7.773 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
